body:
I don't remember when, but quite a while ago all the normal commands/actions (ExampleUser fell out of the world) changed to some sort of pirate speech thing (ExampleUser walked the plank) which is a bit annoying so I need help getting rid of it.

Also this is just on avicus for me.

Does anyone else have that?
body_tagged:
I don't remember when, but quite a while ago all the normal commands/actions (ExampleUser fell out of the world) changed to some sort of pirate speech thing (ExampleUser walked the plank) which is a bit annoying so I need help getting rid of it.

Also this is just on avicus for me.

Does anyone else have that?
title: Weird Pirate Speech

replies.body: I turned mine off. Just go to languages and change pirate talk to English
replies.body_tagged: I turned mine off. Just go to languages and change pirate talk to English

replies.body: I've tried that before and it's only on this server so it can't be the languages.
replies.body_tagged: I've tried that before and it's only on this server so it can't be the languages.

replies.body:
It is the language, like seth said. Avicus has a translation system. If recognise the language that your game and translate the ingame messages in this language.
You can contribute to that system, if you are a native speaker of that language: http://avicus.net/forums/be886c0c6
replies.body_tagged:
It is the language, like seth said. Avicus has a translation system. If recognise the language that your game and translate the ingame messages in this language.
You can contribute to that system, if you are a native speaker of that language: http://avicus.net/forums/be886c0c6

replies.body: I had this issue too, but what I did was I changed my language settings to "Engligh (US)" and it worked perfectly
replies.body_tagged: I had this issue too, but what I did was I changed my language settings to "Engligh (US)" and it worked perfectly

replies.body:
I have this and I am in English[CA]
What are you saying, Canadians are just pirates to you
replies.body_tagged:
I have this and I am in English[CA]
What are you saying, Canadians are just pirates to you

replies.body: Yeah I have English CA and it's pirate. Not that it matters much, though. I kind of like it.
replies.body_tagged: Yeah I have English CA and it's pirate. Not that it matters much, though. I kind of like it.

replies.body: Thank you guys so much! I was just using English (UK)
replies.body_tagged: Thank you guys so much! I was just using English (UK)
